Package Business

Class SongModel

java.lang.Object
Business.SongModel
public class SongModel
extends java.lang.Object
The type Song model will be used by the Playlist Controller, relating our Controller to the Database Manager.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SongModel​(DatabaseManager dm, UserModel um)
    Instantiates a new Song model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlaylist​(Playlist playlist)
    Add playlist is a method that will simply add the given Playlist from our User into the Databases.
    void deletePlaylist​(int id)
    Method meant to Delete playlists from the Database.
    void deleteSong​(int id)
    Method meant to Delete songs from the Database.
    Playlist getPlaylist​(int id)
    Getter for the information of a playlist.
    int getPlaylistSize​(int id)
    Getter for the number of songs in a playlist.
    java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> getPrivatePlaylists()
    Getter for the private playlists available in the database.
    java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> getPublicPlaylists()
    Getter for the public playlists available in the database.
    Song getSong​(int id)
    Getter for an specific song in the database.
    java.util.ArrayList<Song> getSongs​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> songsList)
    Getter for the songs in the database.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getSongsList​(int id)
    Getter for the id of the songs in a playlist.
    void updatePlaylist​(int ID_Song, java.lang.String name_playlist)
    Update playlist is a method that change a song from one playlist to another in the Database.
    void updateSong​(int ID_Song, int duration)
    Update song is used when we want to change the number of times a song has been listened.

      public SongModel​(DatabaseManager dm, UserModel um)
      Instantiates a new Song model.
      Parameters:

      um - the User Model.

  • Method Details

    • deleteSong

      public void deleteSong​(int id)
      Method meant to Delete songs from the Database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id from the song we are willing to delete from Database.

    • deletePlaylist

      public void deletePlaylist​(int id)
      Method meant to Delete playlists from the Database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id from the playlist we are willing to delete from Database.

    • addPlaylist

      public void addPlaylist​(Playlist playlist)
      Add playlist is a method that will simply add the given Playlist from our User into the Databases.
      Parameters:
      playlist - the Playlist created by our User through the Playlist Controller.

    • updatePlaylist

      public void updatePlaylist​(int ID_Song, java.lang.String name_playlist) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Update playlist is a method that change a song from one playlist to another in the Database.
      Parameters:
      ID_Song - Song that we want to change.
      name_playlist - Name of the destination playlist.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Throws when a playlist cannot be found in the database.

    • getPublicPlaylists

      public java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> getPublicPlaylists()
      Getter for the public playlists available in the database.
      Returns:
      The public playlists available.

    • getPrivatePlaylists

      public java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> getPrivatePlaylists()
      Getter for the private playlists available in the database.
      Returns:
      The private playlists available.

      public int getPlaylistSize​(int id)
      Getter for the number of songs in a playlist.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the playlist.
      Returns:
      The number of songs.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The playlist we searched.

    • getSongsList

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getSongsList​(int id)
      Getter for the id of the songs in a playlist.

      Returns:

    • getSongs

      Getter for the songs in the database.

      The songs.

    • getSong

      public Song getSong​(int id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Getter for an specific song in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the song.
      Returns:
      The song.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • updateSong

      public void updateSong​(int ID_Song, int duration)
      Update song is used when we want to change the number of times a song has been listened.
      Parameters:
      ID_Song - The id of the song listened.
      duration - The number of times it has been listened.
